titleStmt.title: A song for St. Cæcilia's Day, Nov. 22, 1686 written by Mr. Tho. Flatman ; and composed by Mr. Isaac Blackwell.
titleStmt.author: Flatman, Thomas, 1637-1688.
Blackwell, Isaac, fl. 1674-1687.

notesStmt.note: Song text, 3 verses and chorus, without the music.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
